items.sentence: You can use English at most hotels around the world.
We haven\'t talked to each other since the accident.
Tom told me that Mary was the one who told him that.
Tom told me that he would like to buy a new bicycle.
My TV broke, so I had to take it to get it repaired.
My uncle went to Mexico in 1983 and never came back.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been working in the garden.
I\'ve been waiting for a friend of mine for an hour.
I\'ve done bad things that I should be punished for.
Tom told Mary that she didn\'t have to wait for him.
